params.name: vocab_size
params.description: Vocabulary size of the MobileBERT model. Defines the number of different tokens that can be represented bythe inputs_ids passed when calling MobileBertModel or TFMobileBertModel.

params.name: hidden_size
params.description: Dimensionality of the encoder layers and the pooler layer.

params.name: num_hidden_layers
params.description: Number of hidden layers in the Transformer encoder.

params.name: num_attention_heads
params.description: Number of attention heads for each attention layer in the Transformer encoder.

params.name: intermediate_size
params.description: Dimensionality of the intermediate (often named feed-forward) layer in the Transformer encoder.

params.name: hidden_act
params.description: The non-linear activation function (function or string) in the encoder and pooler. If string, gelu,relu, silu and gelu_new are supported.

params.name: hidden_dropout_prob
params.description: The dropout probability for all fully connected layers in the embeddings, encoder, and pooler.

params.name: attention_probs_dropout_prob
params.description: The dropout ratio for the attention probabilities.

params.name: max_position_embeddings
params.description: The maximum sequence length that this model might ever be used with. Typically set this to something largejust in case (e.g., 512 or 1024 or 2048).

params.name: type_vocab_size
params.description: The vocabulary size of the token_type_ids passed when calling MobileBertModel orTFMobileBertModel.

params.name: initializer_range
params.description: The standard deviation of the truncated_normal_initializer for initializing all weight matrices.

params.name: layer_norm_eps
params.description: The epsilon used by the layer normalization layers.

params.name: pad_token_id
params.description: The ID of the token in the word embedding to use as padding.

params.name: embedding_size
params.description: The dimension of the word embedding vectors.

params.name: trigram_input
params.description: Use a convolution of trigram as input.

params.name: use_bottleneck
params.description: Whether to use bottleneck in BERT.

params.name: intra_bottleneck_size
params.description: Size of bottleneck layer output.

params.name: use_bottleneck_attention
params.description: Whether to use attention inputs from the bottleneck transformation.

params.name: key_query_shared_bottleneck
params.description: Whether to use the same linear transformation for query&key in the bottleneck.

params.name: num_feedforward_networks
params.description: Number of FFNs in a block.

params.name: normalization_type
params.description: The normalization type in MobileBERT.

params.name: classifier_dropout
params.description: The dropout ratio for the classification head.
